title: PropertyFinder Scraper
description: Scrape properties for sale or rent from PropertyFinder.ae. Provide search criteria or a direct PropertyFinder search URL.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific PropertyFinder.ae search URL. If provided, this overrides other search parameters.

propertyType.title: Property Type
propertyType.description: Type of property to search for

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of properties
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of properties to collect. Leave empty to collect all available.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: Safety cap on the number of search result pages to visit.

collectDetails.title: Collect property details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper visits each property detail page for complete information.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for anti-bot protection. Use Apify Proxy for best results.
